outputs.output_descr: The project seeks to enhance the capacity of government to effectively respond to the emergency following massive floods in parts of the country resulting in loss of lives and property. The project seeks to: 1) Strengthen the coordination role of the Government in the response initiatives a cross the country, 2) Enhance the capacity of the Governement to conduct assessment on the impact of the floods and identify early recovery response activities. 3) Develop a continued recovery programme proposal beyond the initial 6 months period.

project_descr: Enhanced Capacity for Recovery from Floods in Kenya
project_title: Enhanced Capacity for Recovery from Floods
